subject: Harness Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: One More Laugh set a track record for the mile while rolling to victory in the Cane Pace at Freehold Raceway, beating Rockin Image in the first leg of pacing’s Triple Crown.
snippet: One More Laugh set a track record for the mile while rolling to victory in the Cane Pace at Freehold Raceway, beating Rockin Image in the first leg of pacing’s Triple Crown.
